description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Dashboard' that manages and displays a list of Jira projects. It includes state management for projects, filtering, loading/error handling, and UI controls for view modes, search, and filtering. It also handles fetching project data from an API and rendering project cards and a modal for project details.

methods.name: fetchProjects
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch Jira projects using provided credentials, updates state with fetched data or error message.

methods.name: filterProjects
methods.description: Filters the list of projects based on search term and project type filter, updating the filteredProjects state.
